definition: gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: The fallow fields glitter like water indeed.
sentences.chinese: 休耕地似水面波光闪耀。

sentences.english: I love to paint the light reflected off water when it ripples.
sentences.chinese: 我爱画水面漾起涟漪时反射出的粼粼波光。

sentences.english: Where the rivers run clear and the bracken is gold in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 这里，溪流清澈明净，水草在阳光下闪着金色的波光。

sentences.english: You can duck, shimmering tactfully, that I will not stop for a moment.
sentences.chinese: 任你梨涡浅笑，波光婉转，我也不会再停歇片刻。

sentences.english: I can show you the world, shining, shimmering, splendid.
sentences.chinese: 我可以告诉你的世界，闪耀，波光粼粼，华丽。

sentences.english: The glistening light of waves is swimming on the sea top.
sentences.chinese: 俯望海面粼粼的波光曲线。

sentences.english: The sky was clear, and moonlight was shimmering on the lake.
sentences.chinese: 晴空万里，湖上月光波光粼粼。

sentences.english: Moon water, glittering, slightly elongated shadow is the lake.
sentences.chinese: 望月水中，波光粼粼，微微月影被湖面拉长。

sentences.english: The sea, tranquil and smooth , was sparkling in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 海平静安稳，在阳光下波光粼粼。

sentences.english: Is a sonnet chanted by glistening waves.
sentences.chinese: 是波光影调吟诵的十四行诗。

sentences.english: Lake Michigan shimmers in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 密歇根湖在阳光下波光粼粼。

sentences.english: During the day, the sun shines more under the surface of the lake floating light jump gold and sparkling.
sentences.chinese: 白天，阳光照耀下的湖面更是浮光跃金，波光粼粼。

sentences.english: The sea sparkled in the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 阳光下，年夜海波光粼粼。

sentences.english: We want to see the river sparkling clean.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望看见一条干净的波光鳞鳞的河。

sentences.english: But the sea still shone in the distance and the ship was plainly discernible.
sentences.chinese: 但是远处仍然是波光鳞鳞的大海，那大船历历在目。

sentences.english: In the far distance was seen the glittering surface of the West Lake surrounded by green hills.
sentences.chinese: 远处就可看到西子湖波光荡漾的湖面，四周青山环抱。

definition: to ripple/to undulate/also written 蕩漾|荡漾
multicolored sunlight of sunrise or sunset
water and sky merge in one color (idiom)
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
